nodes.text: The Fortuna family was a family of Twi'leks that originated on Ryloth, in the Outer Rim Territories. The family was heavily involved in the criminal underworld, one member, Bib Fortuna, became the majordomo of Jabba Desilijic Tiure's criminal empire. Bib's cousin Beezer Fortuna resented this criminally-minded side of the family and was more politically-minded, occupying an important position in Saw Gerrera's insurgent cell.
